description.ko: VOID-3의 절대적인 어둠 속에서 천체 구조가 서서히 드러나는 심해 우주의 깊은 침묵과 무한한 규모를 경험해 보세요.
description.en: Experience the profound silence and infinite scale of the deep cosmos, where celestial structures emerge from the absolute darkness of VOID-3.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the deep cosmic void, VOID-3 aesthetic, swirling dark nebulae, distant cold stars, gravitational lensing around a central black hole, ultra-detailed textures, volumetric lighting, deep blues and obsidian blacks, 8k resolution, photorealistic, cosmic deep theme.
